mapper.sql: SELECT major_id, graduation_credit_year, grad_vital_edu_credit, grad_select_edu_credit, grad_vital_major_credit, grad_select_major_credit FROM graduation_credit
mapper.select: SELECT m.major_name, g.major_id, g.graduation_credit_year, g.grad_vital_edu_credit, g.grad_select_edu_credit, g.grad_vital_major_credit, g.grad_select_major_credit FROM major m, graduation_credit g WHERE m.major_id = g.major_id AND g.major_id = #{majorId}

SELECT g.major_id, g.graduation_credit_year, g.grad_vital_edu_credit, g.grad_select_edu_credit, g.grad_vital_major_credit, g.grad_select_major_credit FROM graduation_credit g, users u, major m, student s WHERE u.users_id = #{usersId} AND u.users_id = s.stu_id AND s.major_id = m.major_id AND m.major_id = g.major_id AND g.major_id = #{majorId} AND g.graduation_credit_year = #{year}
